CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ferry Services relative to International Terminals?
SRP.A: Ferry Services is {above} International Terminals in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total luggage loss rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {International Terminals}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total luggage loss rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Shared Ride}.

VE.Q: What is Shared Ride's Luggage Loss Rate in 1990?
VE.A: Shared Ride's luggage loss rate in 1990 is {1.46} %.

VE.Q: What is High-Speed Trains's Luggage Loss Rate in 2001?
VE.A: High-Speed Trains's luggage loss rate in 2001 is {0.61} %.

VE.Q: What is Regional Airports's Luggage Loss Rate in 1991?
VE.A: Regional Airports's luggage loss rate in 1991 is {1.49} %.

VE.Q: What are the luggage loss rate of International Terminals, Shared Ride, and Car Rentals in 1998?
VE.A: International Terminals's luggage loss rate is {2.33} %, Shared Ride's luggage loss rate is {0.81} %, Car Rentals's luggage loss rate is {1.13} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Luggage Loss Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum luggage loss rate is {0.22} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Luggage Loss Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum luggage loss rate is {3.33} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Luggage Loss Rate level recorded for Car Rentals?
What is the lowest Luggage Loss Rate level recorded for Car Rentals?
EVJ.A: Car Rentals's lowest recorded level is approximately {0.83} % in {2004}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Luggage Loss Rate?
SC.A: The average total luggage loss rate is {8.16} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Luggage Loss Rate exceed 8.46 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Luggage Loss Rate go below 7.72 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Luggage Loss Rate fall between 7.69 and 8.49 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1996 and 2002, was the average total Luggage Loss Rate higher or lower than between 1997 and 1998?
NC.A: The average total luggage loss rate between 1996 and 2002 was {lower} than between 1997 and 1998.

NC.Q: Was the total Luggage Loss Rate in 2000 higher or lower than in 2001?
NC.A: The total luggage loss rate in 2000 was {higher} than in 2001.

NC.Q: Was the total Luggage Loss Rate in 1991 higher or lower than in 1997?
NC.A: The total luggage loss rate in 1991 was {higher} than in 1997.

NC.Q: Was the total Luggage Loss Rate in 1995 higher or lower than in 2003?
NC.A: The total luggage loss rate in 1995 was {higher} than in 2003.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {International Terminals} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Shared Ride, Regional Airports, High-Speed Trains, Car Rentals, Ferry Services, International Terminals}.
